name: The Dark Key
description:
The Dark Key

My first game upload on itch!!!

Summoned into a dark dungeon cavern, you must find all the keys to the doors to move on. This D&D inspired Puzzle platformer is a fun pixel platformer to play at any given moment. sure to keep your wheels turning and your mind engaged!

The Dark Key has been made with the Godot game engine. Thanks to Kenney assets for the player.

As stated this is my first game, any bugs, recommendations, or comments and be left bellow! Thanks!
